revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Seafloor Cavern |image = [[File:Seafloor Cavern.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Seafloor Cavern. |tokens = 32,000 |location = To the west of Route 128. }} '''Seafloor Cavern''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 530,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Tentacool.png|40px]] Tentacool || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Wailmer.png|40px]] Wailmer || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena, [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Aqua_Admin_(shelly).png|40px]] Aqua Admin Shelly || [[File:Sharpedo.png|40px]] Sharpedo,[[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena |- |}
<!--T:5--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | colspan=2 rowspan=3|<center>N/A || rowspan=2|[[File:Aqua_Leader.png|40px]] Aqua Leader Archie || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena, [[File:Crobat.png|40px]] Crobat || <center>700,000 |- | [[File:Sharpedo.png|40px]] Sharpedo || <center>900,000 |}

<tabs> <!--T:7--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || N/A || 37.48% || 36.00% || 30.00% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 37.48% || 36.00% || 30.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 20.01% || 20.99% || 24.95% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Bluk}} || N/A || 4.01% || 5.20% || 10.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Splash Plate}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 1.99% |- | {{Bag2|Earth Plate}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 1.99% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.22% || 1.06% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:11--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 24.00% || 24.00% || 24.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Bluk}} || N/A || 0.90% || 0.90% || 0.90% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Splash Plate}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | {{Bag2|Earth Plate}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |} </tab> </tabs>
